47 
48 class PoseHandlerNode:
49  """
50  This class is an interface for manipulating object poses and converting them to robot poses.
51  In particular, it allows
52  - creation of workspaces
53  - created of grips
54  - convertion of workspace-relative poses (e.g. from camera) to robot poses
55  """
56 
57  def __init__(self):
58  rospy.logdebug("Poses Handlers - Entering in Init")
59 
60  # Subscribers
61  self.__tcp_enabled = False
62  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/tcp', TCP, self.__callback_tcp)
63 
64  self.__tool_id = 0
65  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/current_id', Int32, self.__callback_tool_id)
66 
67  # Grips
68  tool_config_dict = rospy.get_param("niryo_robot_tools_commander/tool_list", dict())
69  self.__tool_id_gripname_dict = {
70  tool["id"]: "default_" + tool["name"].replace(" ", "_")
71  for tool in tool_config_dict
72  }
73  self.__tool_id_gripname_dict[-1] = "default_Calibration_Tip"
74 
75  grip_dir = rospy.get_param("~grip_dir")
76  self.__grip_manager = GripManager(grip_dir, self.__tool_id_gripname_dict.values())
77  rospy.Service('~get_target_pose', GetTargetPose, self.__callback_target_pose)
78 
79  # Transform Handlers
80  self.__transform_handler = PosesTransformHandler(self.__grip_manager, self)
81 
82  rospy.logdebug("Poses Handlers - Transform Handler created")
83 
84  # -- POSES
85  # Poses
86  poses_dir = rospy.get_param("~poses_dir")
87  self.__pos_manager = PoseManager(poses_dir)
88 
89  rospy.Service('~manage_pose', ManagePose, self.__callback_manage_pose)
90  rospy.Service('~get_pose', GetPose, self.__callback_get_pose)
91  rospy.Service('~get_pose_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_pose_list)
92  self.__pose_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~pose_list', BasicObjectArray, latch=True, queue_size=10)
93  self.__publish_pose_list()
94 
95  # Dynamic Frame
96  self.__tf_listener = None
97  self.__tf_buffer = None
98  dynamic_frame_dir = rospy.get_param("~dynamic_frame_dir")
99  self.dynamic_frame_manager = DynamicFrameManager(dynamic_frame_dir)
100  rospy.Service('~manage_dynamic_frame', ManageDynamicFrame, self.__callback_manage_dynamic_frame)
101  rospy.Service('~get_dynamic_frame', GetDynamicFrame, self.__callback_get_dynamic_frame)
102  rospy.Service('~get_transform_pose', GetTransformPose, self.__callback_get_transform_pose)
103  rospy.Service('~get_dynamic_frame_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_dynamic_frame_list)
104  self.__dynamic_frame_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~dynamic_frame_list',
105  BasicObjectArray,
106  queue_size=10,
107  latch=True)
108  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
109 
110  self.dynamic_frame_manager.restore_publisher()
111  self.dynamic_frame_manager.publish_frames()
112 
113  # Relative pose
114  self.__relative_pose_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~relative_pose', PoseStamped, queue_size=1)
115  self.__current_pose = [0] * 6
116  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/robot_state', RobotState, self.__robot_state_callback, queue_size=1)
117 
118  self.__relative_transform = None
119  rospy.Service('~set_relative_transform_frame', SetString, self.__callback_set_relative_transform_frame)
120  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration.from_sec(1 / 30), lambda _: self.__publish_relative_pose())
121 
122  # Workspaces
123  ws_dir = rospy.get_param("~workspace_dir")
124 
125  self.__ws_manager = WorkspaceManager(ws_dir)
126  rospy.Service('~manage_workspace', ManageWorkspace, self.__callback_manage_workspace)
127  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_ratio', GetWorkspaceRatio, self.__callback_workspace_ratio)
128  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_poses', GetWorkspaceRobotPoses, self.__callback_get_workspace_poses)
129  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_points', GetWorkspacePoints, self.__callback_get_workspace_points)
130  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_matrix_poses', GetWorkspaceMatrixPoses, self.__callback_get_workspace_matrix)
131  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_workspace_list)
132  self.__workspace_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~workspace_list',
133  BasicObjectArray,
134  latch=True,
135  queue_size=10)
136  self.__publish_workspace_list()
137 
138  if rospy.has_param('~gazebo_workspaces'):
139  for ws_name, ws_poses in rospy.get_param('~gazebo_workspaces').items():
140  if ws_name not in self.get_available_workspaces()[0]:
141  rospy.loginfo("Poses Handler - Adding the {} workspace...".format(ws_name))
142  self.create_workspace_from_points(ws_name, "", [Point(*point) for point in ws_poses])
143 
144  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
145  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
146 
147  rospy.loginfo("Poses Handlers - Started")
148 
149  # -- ROS CALLBACKS
150  def __callback_tcp(self, msg):
151  self.__tcp_enabled = msg.enabled
152 
153  def __callback_tool_id(self, msg):
154  self.__tool_id = msg.data
155 
156  # Workspace
157  def __callback_manage_workspace(self, req):
158  cmd = req.cmd
159  workspace = req.workspace
160  if len(workspace.name) > 30:
161  rospy.logwarn('Poses Handlers - Workspace name is too long, using : %s instead', workspace.name[:30])
162  workspace.name = workspace.name[:30]
163  if cmd == req.SAVE:
164  if len(workspace.poses) != 4:
165  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, "Workspaces have 4 positions, {} given".format(
166  len(workspace.poses))
167  try:
168  self.create_workspace(workspace.name, workspace.description, workspace.poses)
169  self.__publish_workspace_list()
170  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created workspace '{}'".format(workspace.name)
171  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
172  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
173  except Exception as e:
174  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
175 
176  elif cmd == req.SAVE_WITH_POINTS:
177  if len(workspace.points) != 4:
178  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, "Workspaces have 4 points, {} given".format(
179  len(workspace.points))
180  try:
181  self.create_workspace_from_points(workspace.name, workspace.description, workspace.points)
182  self.__publish_workspace_list()
183  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created workspace '{}'".format(workspace.name)
184  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
185  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
186  except Exception as e:
187  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
188  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
189  try:
190  self.remove_workspace(workspace.name)
191  self.__publish_workspace_list()
192  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed workspace '{}'".format(workspace.name)
193  except Exception as e:
194  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
195  else:
196  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(req.cmd)
197 
198  def __callback_workspace_ratio(self, req):
199  try:
200  ratio = self.get_workspace_ratio(req.workspace)
201  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", ratio
202  except Exception as e:
203  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), 0
204 
205  def __callback_get_workspace_poses(self, req):
206  try:
207  poses = self.get_workspace_poses(req.name)
208  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", poses
209  except Exception as e:
210  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), 4 * [RobotState()]
211 
212  def __callback_get_workspace_points(self, req):
213  try:
214  points = self.get_workspace_points(req.name)
215  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", points
216  except Exception as e:
217  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), 4 * [Point()]
218 
219  def __callback_get_workspace_matrix(self, req):
220  try:
221  position_matrix, orientation_matrix = self.get_workspace_matrix_poses(req.name)
222  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", position_matrix, orientation_matrix
223  except Exception as e:
224  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), [], []
225 
226  def __callback_get_workspace_list(self, _):
227  return self.name_description_list_from_fun(self.get_available_workspaces)
228 
229  def __publish_workspace_list(self):
230  workspace_array = BasicObjectArray()
231  workspace_array.objects = [
232  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
233  description in zip(*self.get_available_workspaces())
234  ]
235  self.__workspace_list_publisher.publish(workspace_array)
236 
237  # Grips
238  def __callback_target_pose(self, req):
239  try:
240  pose = self.get_target_pose(req.workspace, req.height_offset, req.x_rel, req.y_rel, req.yaw_rel)
241  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", pose
242  except Exception as e:
243  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_COMPUTE_FAILURE, str(e), RobotState()
244 
245  # Position
246 
247  def __callback_get_pose(self, req):
248  try:
249  pos_msg = self.get_pose(req.name)
250  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", pos_msg
251  except Exception as e:
252  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), NiryoPose()
253 
254  def __callback_get_pose_list(self, _):
255  return self.name_description_list_from_fun(self.get_available_poses)
256 
257  def __callback_set_relative_transform_frame(self, req):
258  if req.value == '':
259  self.__relative_transform = None
260  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Disabled the relative transform'
261  elif req.value not in self.dynamic_frame_manager.get_all_names():
262  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_DOES_NOT_EXISTS, f'Dynamic frame "{req.value}" does not exists'
263 
264  try:
265  self.__relative_transform = self.get_transform(req.value, 'world')
266  except tf2_ros.LookupException as lookup_exception:
267  return CommandStatus.TF_ERROR, str(lookup_exception)
268  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Successfully set relative transform frame to "{req.value}"'
269 
270  def __callback_manage_pose(self, req):
271  cmd = req.cmd
272  pose = req.pose
273  if cmd == req.SAVE:
274  try:
275  pose_version = pose.pose_version
276  pose_obj = PoseObj(name=pose.name,
277  description=pose.description,
278  joints=JointsPosition(*pose.joints),
279  pose=Pose(pose.position.x,
280  pose.position.y,
281  pose.position.z,
282  pose.rpy.roll,
283  pose.rpy.pitch,
284  pose.rpy.yaw,
285  metadata=PoseMetadata(pose_version)))
286  self.__pos_manager.create(pose_obj)
287  self.__publish_pose_list()
288  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created Position '{}'".format(pose.name)
289  except Exception as e:
290  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
291  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
292  try:
293  self.remove_pose(pose.name)
294  self.__publish_pose_list()
295  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed Position '{}'".format(pose.name)
296  except Exception as e:
297  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
298  else:
299  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(cmd)
300 
301  # Dynamic Frame
302  def __callback_manage_dynamic_frame(self, req):
303  cmd = req.cmd
304  frame = req.dynamic_frame
305  frame.name = frame.name[:30]
306  if cmd == req.SAVE:
307  if len(frame.poses) != 3:
308  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_CREATION_FAILED, "Frame have 3 points, {} given".format(
309  len(frame.poses))
310  try:
311  self.create_dynamic_frame_from_poses(frame.name,
312  frame.description,
313  frame.poses,
314  frame.belong_to_workspace)
315  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
316  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
317  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
318  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
319  except (ValueError, Exception) as e:
320  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
321  if cmd == req.SAVE_WITH_POINTS:
322  if len(frame.points) != 3:
323  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_CREATION_FAILED, "Frame have 3 points, {} given".format(
324  len(frame.points))
325  try:
326  self.create_dynamic_frame_from_points(frame.name,
327  frame.description,
328  frame.points,
329  frame.belong_to_workspace)
330  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
331  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
332  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
333  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
334  except (ValueError, Exception) as e:
335  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
336  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
337  if frame.belong_to_workspace:
338  return (CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED,
339  "Can't remove a dynamic frame which belong to a workspace")
340  try:
341  self.remove_dynamic_frame(frame.name, frame.belong_to_workspace)
342  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
343  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
344  except Exception as e:
345  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
346  elif cmd == req.EDIT:
347  if frame.belong_to_workspace:
348  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_EDIT_FAILED, "Can't edit a dynamic frame which belong to a workspace"
349  try:
350  if frame.description != '':
351  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_description(frame.name, frame.description)
352  if len(frame.points) == 3:
353  points_as_list = [(p.x, p.y, p.z) for p in frame.points]
354  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_points(frame.name, points_as_list)
355  if frame.rpy != RPY():
356  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_static_transform_w_rpy(frame.name, frame.position, frame.rpy)
357  if frame.orientation != Quaternion():
358  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_static_transform(frame.name, frame.position, frame.orientation)
359  if frame.new_name != '':
360  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_name(frame.name, frame.new_name)
361 
362  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
363  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Edited dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
364  except Exception as e:
365  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_EDIT_FAILED, str(e)
366  else:
367  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(cmd)
368 
369  def __callback_get_dynamic_frame(self, req):
370  try:
371  dyn_frame = self.get_dynamic_frame(req.name)
372  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", dyn_frame
373  except Exception as e:
374  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), None
375 
376  def __callback_get_transform_pose(self, req):
377  try:
378  pose = [req.position.x, req.position.y, req.position.z, req.rpy.roll, req.rpy.pitch, req.rpy.yaw]
379  transform_pose = self.transform_pose_from_frame(pose, req.source_frame, req.local_frame)
380  position = transform_pose.pose.position
381  rpy = self.quaternion_to_rpy(transform_pose.pose.orientation)
382  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", position, rpy
383 
384  except Exception as e:
385  rospy.logerr("Poses Handlers - Error occurred when getting transform: {}".format(e))
386  return CommandStatus.CONVERT_FAILED, str(e), Point(), RPY()
387 
388  def __callback_get_dynamic_frame_list(self, _):
389  return self.name_description_list_from_fun(self.get_available_dynamic_frame_w_description)
390 
391  def __publish_dynamic_frame_list(self):
392  dynamic_frame_array = BasicObjectArray()
393  dynamic_frame_array.objects = [
394  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
395  description in zip(*self.get_available_dynamic_frame_w_description())
396  ]
397  self.__dynamic_frame_list_publisher.publish(dynamic_frame_array)
398 
399  def __publish_pose_list(self):
400  pose_array = BasicObjectArray()
401  pose_array.objects = [
402  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name, description in zip(*self.get_available_poses())
403  ]
404  self.__pose_list_publisher.publish(pose_array)
405 
406  def __robot_state_callback(self, msg):
407  self.__current_pose = [msg.position.x, msg.position.y, msg.position.z, msg.rpy.roll, msg.rpy.pitch, msg.rpy.yaw]
408 
409  def __publish_relative_pose(self):
410  if self.__relative_transform is None:
411  return
412 
413  transform_pose = self.transform_pose(self.__relative_transform, self.__current_pose)
414  self.__relative_pose_publisher.publish(transform_pose)
415 
416  # -- REGULAR CLASS FUNCTIONS
417  # Workspace
418 
419  def create_workspace(self, name, description, robot_poses):
420  """
421  Creates a new workspace based on 4 recorded robot poses. The 0th point
422  needs to be the workspace origin. Points ordered clockwise.
423 
424  :param name: name of the new workspace
425  :param description: description of the new workspace
426  :param robot_poses: [pose when pointing at origin, pose on marker 1,...]
427  """
428  points = []
429  robot_poses_raw = []
430 
431  for pose in robot_poses:
432  rospy.logdebug("Robot point\n{}".format(pose.position))
433  point = self.__transform_handler.get_calibration_tip_position(pose)
434  rospy.logdebug("Tip point\n{}".format(point))
435  points.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
436  pose_obj = [[pose.position.x, pose.position.y, pose.position.z],
437  [pose.rpy.roll, pose.rpy.pitch, pose.rpy.yaw]]
438  robot_poses_raw.append(pose_obj)
439 
440  self.__ws_manager.create(name, points, robot_poses_raw, description)
441 
442  # Asssociate frame
443  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, [points[0]] + [points[3]] + [points[1]], description, True)
444 
445  def create_workspace_from_points(self, name, description, points):
446  """
447 
448  :param name: name of the new workspace
449  :param description: description of the new workspace
450  :param points: [pose of origin marker, pose of marker 1,...]
451  """
452  points_raw = []
453  for point in points:
454  points_raw.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
455  self.__ws_manager.create(name, points_raw, description)
456 
457  # Asssociate frame
458  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, [points_raw[0]] + [points_raw[3]] + [points_raw[1]], description, True)
459 
460  def remove_workspace(self, name):
461  """
462  Removes a workspace
463  :param name: name of the workspace to remove
464  """
465  self.__ws_manager.remove(name)
466 
467  self.dynamic_frame_manager.remove(name, True)
468 
469  def get_available_workspaces(self):
470  """
471  Returns a list of all available workspace names.
472  """
473  return self.__ws_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
474 
475  def get_workspace_poses(self, name):
476  ws_raw = self.__ws_manager.read(name)
477  poses = [RobotState(position=Point(*pose[0]), rpy=RPY(*pose[1])) for pose in ws_raw.robot_poses]
478  return poses
479 
480  def get_workspace_points(self, name):
481  ws_raw = self.__ws_manager.read(name)
482  points = [Point(*pose) for pose in ws_raw.points]
483  return points
484 
485  def get_workspace_matrix_poses(self, name):
486  """
487  Returns position and orientation matrix of a workspace
488  """
489  ws_raw = self.__ws_manager.read(name)
490 
491  position_raw = ws_raw.position_matrix.tolist()
492  orientation_raw = ws_raw.rotation_matrix.tolist()
493 
494  position_matrix = [Point(*pose) for pose in position_raw]
495  orientation_matrix = [Quaternion(*pose) for pose in orientation_raw]
496  return position_matrix, orientation_matrix
497 
498  def get_workspace_ratio(self, workspace):
499  """
500  Reads the ratio (width/height) of the specified workspace. This function is used by the
501  camera to do the perspective transform.
502 
503  :param workspace: name of the workspace
504  """
505  current_ws = self.__ws_manager.read(workspace)
506  return current_ws.x_width / current_ws.y_width
507 
508  # Grips
509  def get_target_pose(self, workspace, height_offset, x_rel, y_rel, yaw_rel):
510  """
511  Computes the robot pose that can be used to grab an object which is
512  positioned relative to the given workspace.
513 
514  :param workspace: name of the workspace the object is in
515  :param height_offset: z-offset that is added
516  :param x_rel: x relative position of the object inside working zone
517  :param y_rel: y relative position of the object inside working zone
518  :param yaw_rel: angle of the object inside working zone
519  """
520  current_ws = self.__ws_manager.read(workspace)
521  self.__transform_handler.set_relative_pose_object(current_ws,
522  x_rel,
523  y_rel,
524  yaw_rel,
525  yaw_center=current_ws.yaw_center)
526 
527  if self.__tcp_enabled:
528  base_link_to_tool_target = self.__transform_handler.get_object_transform(z_off=height_offset)
529  else:
530  current_grip = self.__grip_manager.read(self.__tool_id_gripname_dict[self.__tool_id])
531  current_grip.transform.transform.translation.z += height_offset
532  self.__transform_handler.set_grip(current_grip)
533  base_link_to_tool_target = self.__transform_handler.get_gripping_transform()
534 
535  q = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.rotation
536 
537  roll, pitch, yaw = euler_from_quaternion([q.x, q.y, q.z, q.w])
538 
539  pose = RobotState()
540  pose.position.x = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.translation.x
541  pose.position.y = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.translation.y
542  pose.position.z = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.translation.z
543  pose.rpy.roll = roll
544  pose.rpy.pitch = pitch
545  pose.rpy.yaw = yaw
546 
547  return pose
548 
549  # -- Pose
550 
551  def get_pose(self, name):
552  """
553  Get pose from pose manager and return NiryoPose
554 
555  :param name: pose name
556  :type name: str
557  :return: The pose object
558  :rtype: NiryoPose
559  """
560  pose_obj = self.__pos_manager.read(name)
561  pose = NiryoPose()
562  pose.name = pose_obj.name
563  pose.description = pose_obj.description
564  pose.joints = list(pose_obj.joints)
565  pose.position = Point(x=pose_obj.pose.x, y=pose_obj.pose.y, z=pose_obj.pose.z)
566  pose.rpy = RPY(roll=pose_obj.pose.roll, pitch=pose_obj.pose.pitch, yaw=pose_obj.pose.yaw)
567  rx, ry, rz, w = pose_obj.pose.quaternion()
568  pose.orientation = Quaternion(x=rx, y=ry, z=rz, w=w)
569  try:
570  pose.pose_version = pose_obj.pose.metadata.version
571  except Exception:
572  # pose_version doesn't exist assume it has legacy format
573  pose.pose_version = 0
574  return pose
575 
576  def remove_pose(self, name):
577  """
578  Asks pose manager to remove pose
579 
580  :param name: pose name
581  :type name: str
582  :return: None
583  """
584  self.__pos_manager.remove(name)
585 
586  def get_available_poses(self):
587  """
588  Ask the poses manager which pose(s) are available
589 
590  :return: list of positions name
591  :rtype: list[str]
592  """
593  return self.__pos_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
594 
595  # Dynamic frame
596  def create_dynamic_frame_from_poses(self, name, description, poses, belong_to_workspace=False):
597  """
598  Create a dynamic frame from ManageDynamicFrame message fields
599 
600  :param name: nom de la frame
601  :type name: str
602  :param description : description
603  :type description: str
604  :param poses: list of poses to create the frame
605  :type poses: niryo_robot_msgs/RobotState
606  :return: None
607  """
608  points = []
609 
610  for pose in poses:
611  rospy.logdebug("Robot point\n{}".format(pose.position))
612  point = self.__transform_handler.get_calibration_tip_position(pose)
613  rospy.logdebug("Tip point\n{}".format(point))
614  points.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
615 
616  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, points, description, belong_to_workspace)
617 
618  def create_dynamic_frame_from_points(self, name, description, points, belong_to_workspace=False):
619  """
620  Create a dynamic frame from ManageDynamicFrame message fields
621 
622  :param name: nom de la frame
623  :type name: str
624  :param description : description
625  :type description: str
626  :param points: list of points to create the frame
627  :type points: geometry_msg/Point
628  :return: None
629  """
630  points_raw = []
631  for point in points:
632  points_raw.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
633 
634  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, points_raw, description, belong_to_workspace)
635 
636  def remove_dynamic_frame(self, name, belong_to_workspace=False):
637  """
638  Asks dynamic frame manager to remove dynamic frame
639 
640  :param name: dynamic frame name
641  :type name: str
642  :param belong_to_workspace: whether the dynamic frame belong to a workspace or not
643  :type belong_to_workspace: bool
644  :return: None
645  """
646  self.dynamic_frame_manager.remove(name, belong_to_workspace)
647 
648  def get_dynamic_frame(self, name):
649  """
650  Get dynamic frame from dynamic frame manager and return pose of the frame
651 
652  :param name: pose name
653  :type name: str
654  :return: Pose of the dynamic frame object
655  :rtype: Pose
656  """
657  frame_read = self.dynamic_frame_manager.read(name)
658  pose_obj = frame_read.static_transform_stamped
659 
660  frame = DynamicFrame()
661  frame.name = frame_read.name
662  frame.description = frame_read.description
663  frame.belong_to_workspace = frame_read.belong_to_workspace
664  point = Point(*pose_obj[0])
665  quaternion = Quaternion(*pose_obj[1])
666  roll, pitch, yaw = euler_from_quaternion([quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z, quaternion.w])
667  rpy = RPY(roll, pitch, yaw)
668 
669  frame.position = point
670  frame.orientation = quaternion
671  frame.rpy = rpy
672 
673  return frame
674 
675  def get_available_dynamic_frame_w_description(self):
676  """
677  Ask the dynamic frame manager which dynamic frame are available
678 
679  :return: list of dynamic frame name
680  :rtype: list[str]
681  """
682  return self.dynamic_frame_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
683 
684  def get_transform(self, source_frame, local_frame):
685  if self.__tf_buffer is None or self.__tf_listener is None:
686  self.__tf_buffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
687  self.__tf_listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(self.__tf_buffer)
688 
689  # Get transform
690  transform = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform(source_frame, local_frame, rospy.Time(0), rospy.Duration(4))
691  return transform
692 
693  def transform_pose(self, transform, pose):
694  pose_stamped = tf2_geometry_msgs.PoseStamped()
695  pose_stamped.pose.position = Point(*pose[:3])
696  quaternion = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(*pose[3:])
697  pose_stamped.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*quaternion)
698  pose_stamped.header.frame_id = transform.child_frame_id
699  pose_stamped.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
700 
701  # Calculate pose in world frame
702  transform_pose = tf2_geometry_msgs.do_transform_pose(pose_stamped, transform)
703 
704  return transform_pose
705 
706  def transform_pose_from_frame(self, pose, source_frame, local_frame):
707  """
708  Get the transform pose in source_frame from local_frame
709 
710  :return: transform pose
711  :rtype : list[float]
712  """
713 
714  transform = self.get_transform(source_frame, local_frame)
715  return self.transform_pose(transform, pose)
716 
717  @staticmethod
718  def quaternion_to_rpy(quaternion):
719  euler = euler_from_quaternion([quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z, quaternion.w])
720  return RPY(*euler)
721 
722  @staticmethod
723  def name_description_list_from_fun(fun):
724  response = GetNameDescriptionListResponse()
725  response.status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
726 
727  try:
728  response.name_list, response.description_list = fun()
729  except Exception as e:
730  rospy.logerr("Poses Handlers - Error occured when getting list: {}".format(e))
731  response.status = CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE
732  response.message = str(e)
733 
734  response.objects = [
735  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
736  description in zip(response.name_list, response.description_list)
737  ]
738  return response
739 
740 
741 if __name__ == "__main__":
742  sentry_init()
743 
744  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_poses_handlers', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
745 
746  # change logger level according to node parameter
747  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
748  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
749  logger.setLevel(log_level)
750 
751  try:
752  vision_node = PoseHandlerNode()
753  rospy.spin()
754  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
755  pass
